body.name: Rockland Melbourne Hardside Expandable Spinner Wheel Luggage, Navy, Carry-On 20-Inch
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Carry-On meets these airlines' size restrictions: United, American, Delta, Southwest, Allegiant
Lightweight yet extremely durable ABS material
Interior mesh zip pocket and elasticated pocket
body.description: This carryon is made of abs. The major benefits of this material - it is extremely lightweight, it is durable, and protects the contents of your luggage. Four multi directional spinner wheels rotate 360 degrees for easy maneuverability. This luggage allows you to pack more while avoiding the excess weight surcharges imposed by most airlines. Multi-directional spinner wheels for easy maneuverability. Modern internal chrome telescoping handle with push button handle. Interior mesh and zip pocket and elastic pocket. Measures 20 inchx13 inchx9 inch and weighs 7.5 lbs. Wheel design may vary between black and silver wheels

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: F145: Rockland Melbourne Hardside Expandable Spinner Wheel Luggage This carry on is made of ABS. This material is extremely lightweight, durable, and protects the contents of your luggage. Multi-directional double spinner wheels rotate 360 degrees for easy maneuverability. This luggage allows you to pack more while avoiding the excess weight surcharges imposed by most airlines. 22"x13. 5"x9" (with wheels)

Features and Design Telescoping Handle The telescoping handle stows away conveniently and allows for easy maneuvering when extended. Expandable The upright expands an extra 2 inches in depth to maximize your packing capacity. Double Spinner Wheels Double spinner wheels allow for durable 360 degree maneuverability wherever your travels take you.

About Rockland Luggage Since its inception in 1998, Rockland by Fox Luggage has been proudly producing quality luggage and bags for the style savvy traveler. Recognized for its graphic and colorful designs, Rockland prides itself on creating products influenced by current trends in design and fashion. Our products turn heads in a crowd and stand out in the baggage carousel, making it easy for quick exits out the airport. Affordable and travel resistant, Rockland bags are an ideal companion for everything from quick trips to the gym to overnight getaways to extended vacations. Our selection includes: luggage sets (4 piece, 3 piece or 2 piece), hard cases, soft cases, carry ons, rolling backpacks, travel duffels, rolling duffels, cosmetic bags, and kids' backpacks. Over the years, a few Rockland products have been featured in film and television. Their colorful designs make them ideal for an eye catching visual element on screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2016
reviews.reviewText: This little suitcase worked great on a recent international trip. I fit an amazing amount of clothes and shoes in it, and it rolled along wonderfully at the airport. The way the wheels are designed, you can pull the suitcase behind you or have it roll along beside you, which is less stress on one's back for some reason. My friend, who had an older and different type of small suitcase, was really struggling with hers, because the wheels just weren't cooperating, and she has a bad back, so it was not pleasant for her rushing through the different terminals. (On her return home, she purchased one like mine for her next trip.) In regard to the "carry on" aspect, people should know that this suitcase did not fit under the seat, but it did fit fine in the overhead compartment. Also on some small airplanes, you can't bring any carry on luggage on board; everything has to be checked in plane side. In regard to some reviewers saying the suitcase felt "cheap," I'd say the materials are light, so that the suitcase is light weight, a benefit in my opinion. The proof of the pudding is in the tasting, and I can say that this small, light, and very mobile suitcase held up beautifully on a trip from Albuquerque, New Mexico, to New York City, to Madrid, to Porto, Portugal and back again intact. As I travel in the next few years, we'll see how it holds up, and I may return to this site to update my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little case
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my mother and she thinks it's perfect. Easy to roll, handle adjusts to 2 heights, priced very competitively, looks good and perfect for taking on the plane. Middle section expands about 2" (where it is yellow), has multiple zippers, comes with a tsa approved case lock and appears to be well made (will update if that proves wrong).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect carryon size
reviews.reviewText: Easy to pack and carry, has room for the necessities. Perfect for a 3 day trip. I've had no issues with it, in dozens of airports and flights. Even when forced to check your carryon, it has not had much more than a scrape to the exterior, showing it's battle scars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great carry-on for the price. Seems sturdy and well made. Rolls smoothly. Happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value carry on
reviews.reviewText: We took this as a carry on to Australia. It made it with no damage. We went through a total of 6 airports. I was worried about the quality and the wheels but it worked fine for us. This was in the overhead bin on the plane so it didn't get roughed up like a checked bag might.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed/fragile plastic shell
reviews.reviewText: I had the suitcase 5 weeks when, during the second use, I flipped it over on the carpeted cargo area of my SUV and the corner busted wide open... to the point that I had to carry it with the cracked corner up for the remainder of the trip. Since I was a week beyond my 30 day return period, I had to contact the manufacturer. I’ve messaged them twice in the last week with no response. Would never buy or recommend this product again. I thought that perhaps this was a fluke but, it’s starting to look like the company’s customer service is as bad as it’s product quality.Update: I still have not heard from the company, so I called Amazon support and they credited me everything but a restocking fee. Keep in mind that there is no warranty on these products except for your 30 day return period, unless you buy the additional product warranty. Lesson learned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light duty Carry on luggage
reviews.reviewText: Great size carry on. Used for a 7 day trip to Mexico. We have 2 sets different colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved!! Bigger than expected very solid. 5 stars!!

This carry on is light so it's easier to lift into the overhead storage in airplanes compared to my old carry on luggage. I've flown with it 4 times since buying and it's held up well. It has fit into the overhead compartments of Air Canada, Westjet and Southwest Airlines with no problem.

reviews.reviewTitle: very light great quality - amazing interior space - good zippers -
reviews.reviewText: this product was given to my son for his 12th birthday - he loves it - we just finished multiple aircraft segments and heavy use for three weeks over Xmas holidays! Case stood up really well. Wheels / ball bearings etc spin really well , very light and a bit flexible - better than some other cases we have - zero damage after checking multiple times - also fit really well on overhead bins on American, Jet Blue, Surinam airlines. No problem. Zippers work well and interior compartments are spacious - no wasted space - handle extends and retracts without problems - GREAT product!!
More than I expected. Amazing quality, Nice colour, very easy to move.Would like to get another.

Para el precio está perfecta, llevé ropa para 16 días en ella (muuuy bien doblada) tres pares de zapatos y varios regalos de navidad. Es aceptada como equipaje de mano en Volaris que de repente son muy especiales, no tuve problema. Muy recomendable
